Emblem (Holy Focus), (requires attunement by a Cleric)

A golden seal with an ornate border and a blank face.

While attuned

The seal’s face changes to depict iconography representative of your faith. You can use your action to remove the seal from or magically affix it to a necklace chain, shield, or weapon you are holding. While the seal is somewhere on your person, you gain a +1 bonus to the save DCs of your Cleric spells, as well as to the total result of Faith Die rolls made to deal damage or gain temporary hit points.

Before attacking with any weapon, you can choose to increase the size of the weapon’s damage die any number of steps (to a maximum size of 1d12). On a hit, the damage roll suffers a -1 penalty for each step you chose to increase the damage die (minimum 0 damage).
